mapper.update: update inventory_adjust set inventory_id = #{inventory_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_adjust_employee_code = #{inventory_adjust_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_adjust_employee_name = #{inventory_adjust_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_adjust_num = #{inventory_adjust_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_adjust_date = #{inventory_adjust_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inventory_adjust_before_num = #{inventory_adjust_before_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_adjust_remark = #{inventory_adjust_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where inventory_adjust_id = #{inventory_adjust_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select inventory_adjust_id, inventory_id, inventory_adjust_employee_code, inventory_adjust_employee_name, inventory_adjust_num, inventory_adjust_date, inventory_adjust_before_num, inventory_adjust_remark from inventory_adjust where inventory_adjust_id = #{inventory_adjust_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select inventory_adjust_id, inventory_id, inventory_adjust_employee_code, inventory_adjust_employee_name, inventory_adjust_num, inventory_adjust_date, inventory_adjust_before_num, inventory_adjust_remark from inventory_adjust
